ComicInfo.Summary:
While locked in the brig, Marty learns of his legacy which involves werewolf Nazi killers. Meanwhile, the Viet Cong have unleashed a monstrous creature of their own. Also available with a limited edition cardstock Mike Mignola (Hellboy) cover!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Logan Faerber | 1 | LE | Special Limited Edition Collectors Variant Cover | Eric Powell | 2 |
